contributionDescription: I am a writer who will contribute by explaining various dapps such as beefy, synthetix and Defi. The OP's main focus is the Velodrome that is used to allocate almost all of the chain's liquidity, the OP's ecosystem, and even how the OP works. What is the principle of working? To make it easy for people who want to know and users to understand.

contributionLinks.description: twitter is where I post most of my content.

impactDescription: Work that creates an impact on the end users of the Optimism group or helps bring new users into the group. By creating various content about Optimism that is easy to understand for those who want to know and that users can understand. The things to be done start from, for example, using the Optimism chain, starting with adding the opchain.
